wouldn't far too big be low-res?: that depends how he's thinking about it, but generally when a game exits and doesn't clean up after itself, its in the wrong screenmode, so I made an educated guess ;)

you may have problems if one distro has older/newer versions of some software - the settings in your home directory may confuse it, so perhaps burn off your /home/ partition to disc and reformat, but it shouldn't be too bad - and you could always have /home/orbin/oldhome/ with your previous /home/orbin/ in and move things across as you need them
